story.title: British Science Week #BSW15
story.description: The Museum celebrated British Science Week (13 â€“ 22 March) with facts and stories from the Museum's scientists and conservators.

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

image.caption: To celebrate @ScienceWeekUK, we'll share science facts each day from the Museum's scientists and conservators! #BSW15 http://t.co/cdvDRJqjNO
